original_text: Their wings were joined one to another; they turned not when they went; they went every one straight forward.
korean_text: 날개는 다 서로 연하였으며 갈 때에는 돌이키지 아니하고 일제히 앞으로 곧게 행하며

sentences.original_text: Their wings were joined one to another
they turned not when they went
they went every one straight forward
